title: Help me identify this not Bodoni, not Madrone, not Battista bold serif
content:
What is it!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [iChat Image(877).jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451/http:/typophile.com/files/iChat%20Image(877).jpeg) | 10.98 KB |
author: michellemarie

comments.content:
There are fonts and then there are fonts. This is the latter.

;-)

This is Big Figgins by Matthew Carter available only from Carter and Cone:  
 [http://www.carterandcone.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451/http:/www.carterandcone.com/ "http://www.carterandcone.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b_4029.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BigFiggingsR_6387.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BigFigginsI_4747.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516054451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BigFigginsO_5071.png)

These are crafted very well and kerned to perfection.

Mikey :-)
